Here is an unordered list:

  • Item foo
  • Item bar
  • Item baz
  • Item zip

And an ordered list:

  1. Item one
  2. Item two
  3. Item three
  4. Item four

And a nested list:

  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
      • level 3 item
      • level 3 item
  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
  • level 1 item

Long, single-line code blocks should not wrap. They should horizontally scroll if they are too long. This line should be long enough to demonstrate this.
